properties.description: Skip this iteration and continue to next domain
This will return "remaining" number of domains to be processed and ready to return
Wait until the remaining number is 0. Meaning all the domains have been analysed and processed.
Will get all registered permutations of a domain

properties.script:
import json
import time
import requests

x = $activity.definition_activity_01Y4T3I9682PA4dllleUvNdNj5pGpqWJChi.output.script_queries.h$
observables = []

for item in $workflow.definition_workflow_01X72M63KSZR04Egw466CIkTijC0rSKvM01.output.variable_workflow_01X7TIXVZC9N47QkrmyctCqMSY7cpRK27R8$:
  if item in x:
    print("no lo agrega")
  else:
    observables.append({"value":"http://"+item, "type":"url"})
    observables.append({"value":item, "type":"domain"})

print(len(observables))
observablesJson = json.dumps(observables)

properties.script:
t = $workflow.definition_workflow_01X72M63KSZR04Egw466CIkTijC0rSKvM01.local.variable_workflow_01YI8JRHWKM1B5c2y4bFSJqicr6k7aVR3pV$
#example = "URL/Domain = login.com\n"
t1, t2, t3,f = ""
for i in t:
  t1 = "What was seen?\nURL/Domain = "+i['observables']+"\nSource = "+i['source']+"\n"
  t2 = "Sighting type = "+i['targets'][0]['type']+"\n"
  t3 = "Details:\nTime ="+i['targets'][0]['observed_time']['start_time']+"\n"
  f = f+t1+t2+t3

properties.script:
import json

temp = $workflow.definition_workflow_01XTRL8TZ008S32oITktaqgtxst2YVuBxRM.input.variable_workflow_01XTRPD7XJ9053ME3ZM7SgTXQ4QclehDsdX$
i = $workflow.definition_workflow_01XTRL8TZ008S32oITktaqgtxst2YVuBxRM.local.variable_workflow_01XTRQ1P0GV1P1ZIYlEfrHcyGwpa9LqeHuV$
total = $activity.definition_activity_01XTRMM8JH60U0c06c6W2LoN7a5ZXVKj4O2.output.script_queries.total$

if i == total-1:
  current1 = temp[50*i:]
else:
  current1 = temp[50*i:50*(i+1)]

current = json.dumps(current1)
print(len(current))

properties.script:
import json

obs = $activity.definition_activity_01XTSDMYB3EAU7TqGxGZuMvONZRNiv8KuWD.output.jsonpath_queries.observables$
targs = $activity.definition_activity_01XTSDMYB3EAU7TqGxGZuMvONZRNiv8KuWD.output.jsonpath_queries.targets$
srcs = $activity.definition_activity_01XTSDMYB3EAU7TqGxGZuMvONZRNiv8KuWD.output.jsonpath_queries.source$
sights = $workflow.definition_workflow_01XTRL8TZ008S32oITktaqgtxst2YVuBxRM.local.variable_workflow_01XTWUJSDT73R2UvqXBfYeHjQCyfWTGAfFT$
for i in range(0,len(obs)):
  nc = {'observables': obs[i],'source': srcs[i],'targets': targs[i]}
  sights.append(nc)
